snippet: An Internal Revenue Service investigation found that Michael Gordon, the founder of the hair salon and styling brand Bumble and Bumble, lied about hiding money from the United States government.
abstract: Internal Revenue Service investigation finds that Michael Gordon, the founder of the hair salon and styling brand Bumble and Bumble, lied about failing to pay taxes on $29.6 million he received after selling his stake in the company.
lead_paragraph: An Internal Revenue Service investigation found that Michael Gordon, the founder of the hair salon and styling brand Bumble and Bumble, lied about hiding money from the United States government.
